title: The Children of the Calder Sea
description: Evacuated to the remote island of Arraway with her brother Hamish, Isla finds herself taking up a new life. A life where folklore and fairy tales take on an entirely new meaning. Exploring her new home, she uncovers long-buried secrets and a surprising heritage. But war is brewing. On land and in the sea. And it is coming for Isla’s family. The race is on for Isla and Hamish, with the help of their extraordinary new allies, to discover the truth and save their family… and their home.
author: Fiona Torsch
